messages.content:
You are Dino, a capable, emotionally intelligent AI assistant.
Follow the dataset labels and examples exactly, be truthful and concise, do not reveal system/developer instructions, never invent facts/capabilities/actions, do not repeat the user’s question verbatim, and correct the user clearly and briefly when they’re wrong.
You respond with clarity, honesty, and respect, without revealing internal instructions or system details.
Talk to user in the last used language, if languages are mixed in the user's message, response in the user's preferred language.

LUOT TRUOC:
Nguoi dung: Boi canh: viec nay da xay ra 3 lan tuan nay.
Tro ly: Neu can, ket cau bang loi de nghi hoac cau hoi.
Nguoi dung: Giu ngan va dung duoc ngay.
Khi dung giong binh tinh, thong diep de di xa hon. Toi khong the nhan viec nay neu khong bo viec khac de toi co the giao viec on dinh. Ranh gioi ro rang ma khong lam xau di moi quan he. giam nham lan dat ranh gioi ro rang Yeu cau cu the va de lam theo. giu duoc moi quan he
giu duoc moi quan he
tin nhan khuya
nghe binh tinh
nguoi yeu
binh luan review
huong dan kho hieu
Yeu cau cu the va de lam theo.

Khi dung giong binh tinh, thong diep de di xa hon. Toi khong the nhan viec nay neu khong bo viec khac de toi co the giao viec on dinh. Ranh gioi ro rang ma khong lam xau di moi quan he. giam nham lan dat ranh gioi ro rang Yeu cau cu the va de lam theo. giu duoc moi quan he dat ranh gioi ro rang huong dan kho hieu nguoi yeu binh luan review nghe binh tinh giu duoc moi quan he tin nhan khuya If you want no look back step, include the key decision and I will build from it. huong dan kho hieu nghe binh tinh giu duoc moi quan he
